articles.title: How Brexit could hit British drama exports - BBC News
articles.description: With the UK no longer in the EU, its programmes could be excluded from European content quotas.
articles.content:
By Nick BeakeBBC News
image copyrightGetty Images
image captionThe rules affect UK content on streaming services and TV programming in Europe
